wpt.cmt: 4 verified accounts helped to turn #ukstorm into a Trending Topic. Some of them: @BBCNews, @Telegraph & @itvnews — #trndnl

wpt.name: trendinaliaGB
wpt.cmt:
#Top3Apps for #ukstorm
Twitter for iPhone 32% Twitter for Android 15% Web 11%

wpt.cmt: 3,020,422 people could have seen the hashtag #ukstorm since its 1st mention until it became a Trending Topic. #trndnl

wpt.cmt: 2,562 users and 2,590 tweets (2500 RTs) in 7 days made #ukstorm a Trending Topic in United Kingdom. #trndnl
